item.title: Introduction to Statistics and Data Analysis - With Exercises, Solutions and Applications in R (Second updated and extended edition)
item.description: Our introcutory book contains a comprehensive and thorough overview of fundamental statistical concepts such as hypothesis testing, inference and regression; and each chapter is accompanied by a wealth of exercises and solutions. Have a look at the edicated book page for more details.
